results.title: Safety and efficacy of topical simvastatin plus cholesterol cream versus topical simvastatin cream alone for porokeratosis ptychotropica: A randomized, single-blind, split-body, placebo-controlled, investigator-initiated trial.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: Both topical @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@/@CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ were well tolerated and effective in relieving the @<m>DISEASE_Erythema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004890 @@@erythema@@@, thickness, scaling, and @DISEASE_Pruritus @DISEASE_MESH:D011537 @@@pruritus@@@ of @DISEASE_Porokeratosis @DISEASE_MESH:D017499 @@@PP@@@ with relatively long-term use.

results.text_hl: The addition of @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ improved the scaling, @<m>DISEASE_Erythema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004890 @@@erythema@@@, and @DISEASE_Hyperplasia @DISEASE_MESH:D006965 @@@epidermal hyperplasia@@@ caused by high-dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment (Figs. 3, 4).
